mapper.select: /*selectCourseList*/ select DISTINCT open.course_id, course_title, min(start_day) over (partition by open.course_id) as "startDay", max(end_day) over (partition by open.course_id) as "endDay", sum(cost) over (partition by open.course_id) as "cost", recruit_start_day, recruit_end_day, state_cd as "state", comn_cd_title from open left join subject on open.subject_id = subject.subject_id left join course on open.course_id = course.course_id left join common_code on open.state_cd = common_code.comn_cd where open.course_id IS NOT NULL and del_yn = 'N'

/*selectSubjectList*/ select open.subject_id, subject_seq, subject_title, support_yn, days, hours, level_cd as "level", level_etc, subject.cost, open.course_id, course.course_title, start_time, end_time, start_day, end_day, recruit_start_day, recruit_end_day, recruit_people, state_cd as "state", comn_cd_title, file_id from open left join subject on open.subject_id = subject.subject_id left join course on open.course_id = course.course_id left join common_code on open.state_cd = common_code.comn_cd where del_yn = 'N' order by start_day, end_day

/*selectSubjectDetails*/ select open.subject_id, subject_seq, subject_title, support_yn, days, hours, level_cd as "level", level_etc, subject.cost, open.course_id, course.course_title, subject.cat_cd as "cat", content, TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(start_time, 'HH24:MI'),'HH24:MI') as start_time, TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(end_time, 'HH24:MI'),'HH24:MI') as end_time, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(recruit_start_day,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as recruit_start_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(recruit_end_day,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as recruit_end_day, recruit_people, state_cd as "state", comn_cd_title, upload_file.file_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type from open left join subject on open.subject_id = subject.subject_id left join course on open.course_id = course.course_id left join common_code on open.state_cd = common_code.comn_cd left join upload_file on open.file_id = upload_file.file_id where open.subject_id = #{subjectId} and subject_seq=#{subjectSeq}
mapper.update: /*updateSubject*/ update open set start_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), end_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), start_time = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime},'HH24:MI'),'HH24MI'), end_time = TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime},'HH24:MI'),'HH24MI'), recruit_start_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{recruitStartDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), recruit_end_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{recruitEndDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), recruit_people = #{recruitPeople}, content = #{content}, state_cd = #{state}, file_id=#{fileId}, modi_id='mgr2', modi_dt=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') where subject_id = #{subjectId} and subject_seq = #{subjectSeq}

/*updateFileData*/ update upload_file set file_name=#{fileName}, file_size=#{fileSize}, file_content_type=#{fileContentType}, file_data=#{fileData}, modi_id='mgr2', modi_dt=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') where file_id=#{fileId}
mapper.select: /*getFile*/ select file_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_data from upload_file where file_id = #{fileId}
mapper.insert: /*insertFileData*/ insert into upload_file (file_id, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_data, reg_id, reg_dt, del_yn) values(#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileData}, 'mgr1', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'N')
mapper.select: /*infoSubject*/ select subject_id, subject_title, support_yn, cat_cd as "catSubject", days, hours, level_cd as "level", level_etc, cost from subject where subject_id= #{subjectId}

/*infoOpenCourse*/ select DISTINCT course_id, min(start_day) over (partition by course_id) as "startDay", max(end_day) over (partition by course_id) as "endDay", recruit_start_day, recruit_end_day from open where course_id = #{courseId} and del_yn = 'N'
/*checkOpenCourse*/ select count(*) from open where course_id = #{courseId} and del_yn = 'N' and state_cd <> 'OPN07'
mapper.update: /*updateRecruitSameCourse*/ update open set recruit_start_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{recruitStartDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), recruit_end_day = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{recruitEndDay},'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD'), state_cd=#{state} where course_id = #{courseId} and del_yn = 'N' and state_cd <> 'OPN07'
mapper.select: /*selectSubjectByCourseId*/ select subject_id from open where course_id = #{courseId} and del_yn = 'N' and state_cd <> 'OPN07'
select subject_id, subject_title, support_yn, cat_cd as cat_subject, days, hours, level_cd, level_etc, cost, reg_year from subject
